t: Psalm 25
Teach Me Your Paths
Of David.
To*pn you, O Lord,*s I lift up my soul.
O*ln my God, in you I trust; let*ld me not be put to shame; let*ld not my enemies exult over me.
Indeed,*ln none who wait for you shall be put to shame; they*ld shall be ashamed who are wantonly treacherous.

Good*pn and upright is the Lord;*s therefore*ld he instructs sinners in the way.
He*ln leads the humble in what is right, and*ld teaches the humble his way.
